Keywords: Deity , Future , Robot , Sentinel
Real Name: Karima Shapandar
Special Powers
ADAPTIVE THREAT PROTOCOLS: When Omega takes damage, give her an Adaptation token for each damage taken. // FREE: Remove any number of Adaptation tokens. Until your next turn, modify Omega's combat values +1 for each token removed.
REGENERATIVE CIRCUITRY: The first time Omega would be KO'd, instead turn her to click #10, remove all Adaptation tokens, and heal her 1 click for each token removed. Protected: Pulse Wave.
POLYMORPHIC ALLOY: Outwit, Shape Change.

Comments
June 7, 2021
Dortmuner
I played against her for the second time today, and she really should be 300 points. You've got essentially a 20 point dial, and then she still gets to collect Adaptation tokens the second time around, so you're hitting with a 14 for 7 points of damage, then at least a 13 for 6. Then you have three shots of Steal Energy and at least one of Regeneration. Great reducers down half the dial. She also gets Outwit and is Protected:Outwit. Definitely starts to get squishy mid-dial, but that an insane amount of power. And when she was originally costed, she could do Pulse Wave for printed damage! That's ridiculous.
April 28, 2021
fastcat99
Final problem solved with the new rules.!
January 24, 2021
brainiacFTW
[QUOTE=fastcat99;12103444]This piece is just insane. How could you not like it, or at least acknowledge the sheer Destroyo elements of the dial? Wow. The only question I have is about giving her tokens. It says 'for each damage taken' and it does mean for each click of damage taken, right? Would this include clicks of pushing damage taken? And the dial is so good, I can't think of many instances where I'd want to sacrifice healing for boosts to the already crazy stats.[/QUOTE] It does include clicks of pushing, but since she has Cosmic Energy (which is just Power Cosmic with a more flavor-neutral name) the question is pretty much academic :p
